AboutPage.title: About Qwen Image Layered
AboutPage.description: Qwen Image Layered is a revolutionary AI-powered image layer decomposition tool that automatically separates images into editable RGBA layers.
AboutPage.introduction: üëã Hi there! This is Qwen Image Layered, an AI-powered tool that automatically decomposes any image into editable RGBA layers. No Photoshop skills required - Qwen Image Layered does the work for you. If you have any questions, welcome to contact us.

HomePage.title: Qwen Image Layered
HomePage.description: Qwen Image Layered - Ai Layer Splitter  Tool. Automatically decompose any image into editable RGBA layers with AI.

hero.title: Qwen Image Layered - Ai Layer Splitter
hero.description: Qwen Image Layered automatically decomposes any image into multiple editable RGBA layers. No Photoshop skills required - Qwen Image Layered AI does the work for you.

logocloud.title: Trusted by designers using Qwen Image Layered worldwide

introduction.title: What is Qwen Image Layered
introduction.description: Qwen Image Layered is an advanced AI model capable of decomposing an image into multiple RGBA layers. This layered representation unlocks inherent editability - each layer can be independently manipulated without affecting other content.

feature1.title: AI-Powered Layer Decomposition
feature1.description: Qwen Image Layered automatically separates your image into multiple editable layers with transparency. No manual selection or masking needed.

feature2.title: Smart Background Reconstruction
feature2.description: Qwen Image Layered intelligently fills in hidden areas behind objects, creating complete layers ready for editing.

feature3.title: High-Fidelity Editing
feature3.description: Qwen Image Layered naturally supports high-fidelity elementary operations such as resizing, repositioning, and recoloring.

feature4.title: Flexible Layer Control
feature4.description: Qwen Image Layered supports 3-8+ layers based on image complexity. Decompose layers recursively for infinite refinement.

feature5.title: Independent Layer Manipulation
feature5.description: With Qwen Image Layered, resize, recolor, move, or replace objects independently without affecting other layers.

feature6.title: Professional Results
feature6.description: Qwen Image Layered enables high-fidelity and consistent editing that was previously only possible with manual Photoshop work.

introduction.bottomText: Qwen Image Layered represents a paradigm shift in image editing. Try Qwen Image Layered today and discover how AI can transform your creative workflow.

showcase.title: Qwen Image Layered in Action
showcase.description: See how Qwen Image Layered transforms images into editable layers with real-world examples. Experience the power of AI-driven layer decomposition.

item1.title: Automatic Layer Separation
item1.description: Qwen Image Layered automatically decomposes complex images into multiple editable RGBA layers with precision.

item2.title: Smart Object Manipulation
item2.description: Resize, recolor, and reposition objects independently with Qwen Image Layered's intelligent layer system.

item3.title: Professional Image Editing
item3.description: Achieve studio-quality results with Qwen Image Layered's high-fidelity editing capabilities.

showcase.bottomText: Experience the revolutionary power of Qwen Image Layered. Upload your image and see the magic happen automatically.

buildForYou.title: Built For Your Creative Workflow
buildForYou.description: Qwen Image Layered's AI layer decomposition serves diverse creative professionals. Discover how our tool transforms workflows across industries.

audience1.title: Designers & Design Studios
audience1.description: Quickly decompose client designs, posters, and advertisements into editable layers for rebranding and modifications.
audience1.useCase1: One-click layer extraction from composite images
audience1.useCase2: Save hours of manual Photoshop masking work
audience1.useCase3: Export layered PSD files for seamless editing

audience2.title: E-commerce Sellers & Product Photographers
audience2.description: Separate products from backgrounds, adjust angles, and place items in different scenes effortlessly.
audience2.useCase3: Reduce outsourcing costs for photo editing

audience3.title: UI & Game Designers
audience3.description: Extract layers from artwork and UI references for precise modifications, color adjustments, and element isolation.
audience3.useCase1: Identify and separate UI elements, textures, and shadows
audience3.useCase2: High-precision layer masks for game assets
audience3.useCase3: Accelerate game UI and scene production

audience4.title: Video & Animation Creators
audience4.description: Extract elements from keyframes for motion tracking, green screen replacement, and animation workflows.
audience4.useCase2: Motion tracking preparation from static images

audience5.title: AR/VR Content Creators
audience5.description: Extract subjects and backgrounds from 2D images for depth estimation and 3D environment construction.

audience6.title: Document & Educational Content Editors
audience6.description: Separate text, charts, and backgrounds in textbooks and learning materials for reformatting and multilingual adaptation.
audience6.useCase1: Automatic text and content layer recognition
audience6.useCase2: Digitize and reformat legacy educational materials

audience7.title: Content Creators & Social Media
audience7.description: Quickly adapt existing visuals to create multiple variations for thumbnails, covers, and promotional content.
audience7.useCase1: Generate multiple design variants from one source
audience7.useCase2: Save on stock asset and design outsourcing costs

audience8.title: Architectural & Interior Designers
audience8.description: Extract different regions from reference photos and renders for virtual modifications and design comparisons.
audience8.useCase1: Separate walls, furniture, and decorative elements

buildForYou.bottomText: From professional designers to content creators, Qwen Image Layered empowers everyone to achieve professional-grade results with AI-powered automation.

features.title: Qwen Image Layered Features
features.subtitle: Revolutionary AI Image Layer Decomposition
features.description: Discover how Qwen Image Layered transforms your image editing workflow with AI-powered automation. Qwen Image Layered automatically decomposes any image into editable RGBA layers.

item-1.title: Automatic Layer Decomposition
item-1.description: Qwen Image Layered AI automatically separates your image into multiple editable layers with transparency. No manual selection or masking needed with Qwen Image Layered - AI does the work for you instantly.

item-2.title: Smart Background Reconstruction
item-2.description: Qwen Image Layered intelligently fills in hidden areas behind objects, creating complete layers ready for editing. Perfect for object removal and replacement with Qwen Image Layered.

item-3.title: Flexible Layer Control
item-3.description: Qwen Image Layered supports 3-8+ layers based on image complexity. Decompose layers recursively with Qwen Image Layered for infinite refinement and precision in your edits.

item-4.title: Easy Editing Operations
item-4.description: With Qwen Image Layered, resize, recolor, move, or replace objects independently without affecting other layers. High-fidelity editing made simple by Qwen Image Layered.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that works best for you

item-1.question: Do you offer a free trial?
item-1.answer: Yes, we offer a 7-day free trial.

item-2.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
item-2.answer: You can cancel your subscription by visiting the billing page.

item-3.question: Can I change my plan?
item-3.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time by visiting the billing page.

item-4.question: What is the refund policy?
item-4.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you are not happy with our product.

item-5.question: Can't find what you're looking for?
item-5.answer: Please contact our customer support team at support@mksaas.com

testimonials.title: Ai Layer Splitter Tool Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Image Layered results trusted by teams who need fast, editable layers

item-1.name: Mina Zhao
item-1.quote: We replace product backgrounds all day. Ai Layer Splitter Tool delivers an Image Layered PSD in seconds, so I can ship 20 variations before lunch.

item-2.name: Alex Romero
item-2.quote: Clients send flattened posters. Ai Layer Splitter Tool splits every element into an Image Layered file, cutting hours of manual masking.

item-3.name: Jiho Park
item-3.quote: For game UI, I need clean masks for materials and shadows. The Image Layered output keeps every layer editable, so I iterate faster.

item-4.name: Priya Singh
item-4.quote: I shoot catalogs and need fast background swaps. Ai Layer Splitter Tool separates products from scenes accurately, which makes batch edits painless.

item-5.name: Diego Alves
item-5.quote: Pulling elements from stills for motion comps used to be frame-by-frame. This tool extracts layers from key frames and saves me days of rotoscoping.

item-6.name: Elena Kovac
item-6.quote: We turn 2D images into 3D-ready assets. Image Layered separation gives cleaner depth cues and faster scene assembly.

item-7.name: Hannah Lee
item-7.quote: Text, charts, and backgrounds finally come apart cleanly. Ai Layer Splitter Tool makes re-layout and localization much faster.

item-8.name: Leo Chen
item-8.quote: Thumbnails are my daily grind. With Image Layered exports, I remix subjects, text, and effects into multiple variants in minutes.

item-9.name: Emma Rossi
item-9.quote: I lift furniture and wall textures from reference shots, then test options for clients. The layered output speeds up every mockup.

item-10.name: Nora Patel
item-10.quote: Campaigns often arrive as flattened composites. Ai Layer Splitter Tool breaks them into editable layers so we can localize and A/B test faster.

item-11.name: Kai Nguyen
item-11.quote: We get huge concept boards from outsource teams. Image Layered splits help me isolate icons, frames, and effects without rebuilding.

item-12.name: Sara Ibrahim
item-12.quote: Packaging revisions come fast. The tool gives clean layer separation, so color swaps and label changes are painless.
